Math and Pencil | Software Engineer | Anywhere/NYC | Full-time | https://www.mathandpencil.com

We are a small full-stack consulting agency with locations on the US East and West coast (Seattle, DC, Philly, NYC, Maryland, and Buffalo). I'm looking for a talented python developer looking to work remotely full-time building applications using:

React/Redux/Jest/Websockets, Python(Django), Postgres/Redis, AWS/S3/Ubuntu, CircleCI/Jenkins

My client is a well-funded start-up changing the ways in which hurricane insurance is bought/sold/and priced. We are building extremely exciting real-time technologies and you will have a lot of leverage/ownership of the product/features you are building. The team comes from a wide variety of schools and submission (UVA, Stanford UMD, UMICH, etc), and you will have a ton of flexibility with work hours and work-life balance (the team is 3 years old has has an attrition rate of 0%).

If you are located in or near NYC a plus, but it shouldn't matter for the right candidate. You will need to have a 4 year degree in a technical subject for this specific contract.

For more info: joseph dot misiti @ mathandpencil.com
